INSERT INTO calculate( calculate_user_id, calculate_year, calculate_month, calculate_ag_fee_sum, calculate_sliding_sum, calculate_add_fee_sum, calculate_supply_sum, calculate_surtax_sum, calculate_personal_ag_sum, calculate_business_sum, calculate_total_sum, calculate_create_date ) VALUES( #{calculateUserId}, #{calculateYear}, #{calculateMonth}, #{calculateAgFeeSum}, #{calculateSlidingSum}, #{calculateAddFeeSum}, #{calculateSupplySum}, #{calculateSurtaxSum}, #{calculatePersonalAgSum}, #{calculateBusinessSum}, #{calculateTotalSum} now()
)
mapper.select: SELECT * ,(SELECT code_name FROM code WHERE code_id = l.ledger_financial_company_cd) as ledgerFinancialCompanyCdName ,(SELECT code_name FROM code WHERE code_id = l.ledger_financial_product_cd) as ledgerFinancialProductCdName FROM contract c LEFT JOIN ledger l ON c.contract_ledger_seq=l.ledger_seq WHERE c.contract_seq = #{contractSeq}

select u.user_id ,u.user_name ,u.user_business_type_cd ,(SELECT code_name FROM code WHERE code_id = u.user_business_type_cd) as user_business_type_cd_name ,u.user_ag_company from calculate c join users u on c.calculate_user_id=u.user_id where calculate_seq=#{calculateSeq}

select distinct calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum as calculatePersonalTotalPaySum ,(calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum)/1.1 as calculatePersonalTotalPaySupply ,(calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum)/1.1*0.967 as calculateBusinessIncomePay ,(calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum)/1.1-(calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum)/1.1*0.967 as calculateBusinessIncomePayReport ,case when (select user_business_type_cd from users u where u.user_id=c.calculate_user_id)=5100 then (calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum)-((calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum)/1.1*0.967) when (select user_business_type_cd from users u where u.user_id=c.calculate_user_id)=5200 then (calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum)-(calculate_ag_fee_sum+calculate_sliding_sum+calculate_add_fee_sum) end as calculateAgFeeTotalDifference from calculate c left join contract con on c.calculate_seq=con.contract_calculate_seq left join ledger l on con.contract_ledger_seq=l.ledger_seq where calculate_seq=#{calculateSeq}
AND ledger_financial_company_cd = #{ledgerFinancialCompanyCd}

select l.ledger_financial_company_cd ,(SELECT code_name FROM code WHERE code_id = l.ledger_financial_company_cd) as ledger_financial_company_cd_name ,case when (select user_business_type_cd from users where user_id=c.contract_user_id)=5100 then contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum + contract_add_ag_fee_sum + contract_ag_sliding_sum else 0 end as calculatePersonalTotalPaySum ,case when (select user_business_type_cd from users where user_id=c.contract_user_id)=5200 then contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum + contract_add_ag_fee_sum + contract_ag_sliding_sum else 0 end as calculateBusinessTotalPaySum ,(contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum + contract_add_ag_fee_sum + contract_ag_sliding_sum)/1.1 as calculatePersonalTotalPaySupply ,(contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum + contract_add_ag_fee_sum + contract_ag_sliding_sum) - ((contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum + contract_add_ag_fee_sum + contract_ag_sliding_sum)/1.1) as calculatePersonalTotalPaySurtax ,(contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum + contract_add_ag_fee_sum + contract_ag_sliding_sum)/1.1*0.033 as calculateThreeDotThreeDeduction ,((contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum + contract_add_ag_fee_sum + contract_ag_sliding_sum)/1.1) -((contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum + contract_add_ag_fee_sum + contract_ag_sliding_sum)/1.1*0.033) as calculateBusinessIncomePay from contract c join ledger l on c.contract_ledger_seq=ledger_seq where contract_calculate_seq=#{calculateSeq}
AND ledger_financial_company_cd = #{ledgerFinancialCompanyCd}

select sum(calculatePersonalTotalPaySum) as calculatePersonalTotalPaySum ,sum(calculateBusinessTotalPaySum) as calculateBusinessTotalPaySum ,sum(calculatePersonalTotalPaySum)+sum(calculateBusinessTotalPaySum) as calculateTotalPaySum ,sum(calculatePersonalTotalPaySupply) as calculatePersonalTotalPaySupply ,sum(calculatePersonalTotalPaySurtax) as calculatePersonalTotalPaySurtax ,sum(calculateThreeDotThreeDeduction) as calculateThreeDotThreeDeduction ,sum(calculateBusinessIncomePay) as calculateBusinessIncomePay 사업소득지급액 ,sum(calculateBusinessIncomePay) as calculateBusinessIncomePayReport 사업소득신고액 from "ViewCalculateInfoListByAdmin" where contract_calculate_seq=#{calculateSeq}

select distinct ledger_financial_company_cd ,(select code_name from code where code_id=l.ledger_financial_company_cd) as ledger_financial_company_cd_name from contract c join ledger l on c.contract_ledger_seq=l.ledger_seq where contract_calculate_seq=#{calculateSeq}
